summary: Five California women struggle with personal problems as their own paths unwind in ways unexpected.
cast: Glenn Close|Cameron Diaz|Calista Flockhart|Kathy Baker|Amy Brenneman|Valeria Golino|Holly Hunter|Matt Craven|Gregory Hines|Miguel Sandoval|Noah Fleiss|Danny Woodburn|Penelope Allen|Roma Maffia|Mika Boorem|Irma St. Paule|Juanita Jennings|Laura Leigh Hughes|Erik King|Elpidia Carrillo|Yolanda Arroyo|Jacob Avnet|George E. Roberts|Carmel Wynne Smith
title: Cosas que diría con sólo mirarla
